scripts.db_setup: env RAILS_ENV=development bundle exec rake db:setup db:migrate
scripts.db_setup_test: env RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rake db:setup db:migrate
scripts.rspec: npm run db_setup_test; env RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rspec
scripts.server: env RAILS_ENV=development bundle exec rails s
scripts.test: npm run rubocop; npm run rspec
